metadata.how_to_trigger: Use the lever (S_IRN_PrisonerGroup3_Lever_6ba0cbe2-09e7-4e24-9036-c97ae91f2722) to unlock the door to Prisoner Group 3, which will free them and play the AD.

0.speaker: Deedle Ofran
0.text: Bloody hells, thank you! I hope Genshu and Bala are all right...

1.speaker: Deedle Ofran
1.text: If I don't make it out in time, tell my siblings I loved them. Please.
